title: ðŸš¨ Rams sign Jalen Ramsey to richest CB extensionÂ ever - Emergency Podcast (Football 9/9)
description:
The speculation surrounding Jalen Ramsey's contract can end, effective immediately. On Wednesday morning, the Rams made Ramsey the richest CB in league history, by locking him up to a 5-year, $105m extension. Will Brinson is joined by Superfriends Ryan Wilson and John Breech to break down the move. The guys discuss the type of team that Los Angeles is creating, how this deal compares to others at the position and future compensation we could see for cornerbacks.Â 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
